products.name: Apple iPhone X
products.description: The Apple iPhone X features an all-screen design, Face ID and wireless charging.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S9
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S9 features a 5.8-inch Super AMOLED display, a dual-aperture camera and wireless charging.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: The Sony PlayStation 5 features lightning-fast loading times, haptic feedback, and an immersive gaming experience.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
products.description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is ultra-thin, lightweight and has a powerful processor for work or play.

products.name: Apple iPad Pro
products.description: The Apple iPad Pro features a Liquid Retina display and is powerful enough to replace your laptop.

products.name: Google Pixel 5
products.description: The Google Pixel 5 features an excellent camera and long battery life.

products.name: Amazon Kindle Oasis
products.description: The Amazon Kindle Oasis features a large screen, long battery life and waterproofing.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 is a lightweight laptop with a beautiful design and powerful processor.

products.name: Nintendo Switch
products.description: The Nintendo Switch is a hybrid gaming console that can be used at home or on the go.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
products.description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II features noise-cancellation and Alexa voice control.

products.name: Fitbit Versa 3
products.description: The Fitbit Versa 3 is a smartwatch with fitness tracking and built-in Amazon Alexa.
